data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Bântéay Méanchey, Cambodia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bântéay Méanchey, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Bântéay Méanchey, Cambodia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Bântéay Méanchey who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Bântéay Méanchey, Cambodia will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, 0.1% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Bântéay Méanchey against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Bântéay Méanchey access to a Bible in their own language.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bântéay Méanchey, Cambodia has a population of 678,000.

We estimate Bântéay Méanchey has 13,867 people who might know Jesus, 9,415 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 654,718 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 48 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 13,867 believers in Bântéay Méanchey and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

location.name: Bântéay Méanchey
location.cities_list: Paoy Paet, Sisophon, Ta Phraya, Svay Chek, Thma Puok
location.cities_list_w_pop: Paoy Paet (79,000), Sisophon (23,218), Ta Phraya, Svay Chek, Thma Puok
